thread.title_full: ALDS TV schedule: Kansas City Royals vs. Houston Astros Game 4 live stream: Time, TV, channel, how to watch online | NJ.com

author: Ryan Hatch | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: ALDS TV schedule: Kansas City Royals vs. Houston Astros Game 4 live stream: Time, TV, channel, how to watch online
text:
The Kansas City Royals and Houston Astros play Game 4 of the American League Division Series Monday afternoon, the Astros up 2-1 in the series.
Royals' right-hander Yordano Ventura (13-8, 4.08) will face Astros' righty Lance McCullers (6-7, 3.22).
Here's everything you need to know about watching the game:
What : Royals-Astros
When : 1 p.m. ET
Where : Minute Maid Park, Houston, TX.
Series record : 2-1, Houston
TV : FS1
Live steam: Fox Sports GO ; MLB.com (subscription required; $4.99 for all postseason minus World Series)
Radio : ESPN Radio, KCSP 610; KBME790
